com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.physics

Class OcclusionBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.physics.OcclusionBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class OcclusionBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Software rasterizer used for depth rendering and testing of bounding box triangles. Stores depth values inside a FloatBuffer. CPU rendering is used in order to avoid the frequent GPU to CPU synchronization which would be needed if hardware rendering were to be used for occlusion culling queries.

    Based on the algorithm from the Bullet CDTestFramework, BulletSAPCompleteBoxPruningTest.cpp, written by Erwin Coumans.

    Author:
    jsjolund

        public void drawAABB(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 center,
                     com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 halfExt)
        Renders an AABB (axis aligned bounding box) to the depth buffer.
        Parameters:

        halfExt - Half extents of AABB.

      • drawBB

        public void drawBB(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4 worldTransform,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 halfExt)
        Renders a bounding box to the depth buffer. Does not need to be axis aligned, but will use the translation, rotation and scale from the matrix parameter.
        Parameters:
        worldTransform - World transform of the box to render.
        halfExt - Half extents of the box.

      • drawBox

        private boolean drawBox(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3[] vertices,
                        OcclusionBuffer.Policy policy)
        Draws a bounding box to the depth buffer, or queries the depth buffer at the pixels the box occupies, depending on policy.
        Parameters:
        vertices - Vertices of box.
        policy - Rasterization policy to use.
        Returns:
        True if query policy is used, and any part of the box passes a depth test. False otherwise.

      • drawDebugTexture

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion drawDebugTexture()
        Draw the depth buffer to a texture. Slow, should only be used for debugging purposes.
        Returns:
        Region of debug texture.

      • drawTriangle

        private boolean drawTriangle(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 a,
                             com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 b,
                             com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 c,
                             OcclusionBuffer.Policy policy)
        Rasterizes a triangle with linearly interpolated depth values.

        If used with OcclusionBuffer.Policy.DRAW the triangle will be drawn to the depth buffer wherever it passes a depth test.

        If OcclusionBuffer.Policy.QUERY is used, the depth values in the triangle will be compared with existing depth buffer values. If any pixel passes a depth test the rasterization will be aborted and the method will return true.

        Parameters:
        a - Triangle vertex in camera space.
        b - Triangle vertex in camera space.
        c - Triangle vertex in camera space.
        policy - Draw or query policy.
        Returns:
        With query policy, true if any pixel in the triangle passes a depth test. False otherwise.

      • queryAABB

        public boolean queryAABB(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 center,
                         com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 halfExt)
        Queries the depth buffer as to whether an AABB (axis aligned bounding box) is completely occluded by a previously rendered object. If any part of the AABB is visible (not occluded), the method returns true.
        Parameters:
        center - Center of AABB in world coordinates.
        halfExt - Half extents of AABB.
        Returns:
        True if any part of the AABB is visible, false otherwise.

      • setAABBVertices

        private static void setAABBVertices(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 center,
                                    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 halfExt,
                                    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3[] vertices)
        Calculates the eight vertices of an AABB.
        Parameters:
        center - Center point
        halfExt - Half extents
        vertices - Vertices output

      • setProjectionMatrix

        public void setProjectionMatrix(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4 matrix)
        Sets the projection matrix to be used for rendering. Usually this will be set to Camera.combined.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix to set to.
